text.__SUMMARY__: Styloptygma luteum is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The size of the shell attains 5 mm.
text.Distribution: This marine species occurs off New Caledonia.
text.References: Souverbie, M. (1875) Descriptions d’espèces nouvelles de l’Archipel Calédonien. Journal de Conchyliologie, 23, 282–296.
